posts.message:
Anybody have experience with HTML5 Mobile Application Frameworks ?
Which one is better ? and why ?

for example :

Sencha Touch
JQuery Mobile
Ionic and AngularJS
Kendo UI
Appcelerator Titanium
App Framework 
Twitter Bootstrap 3
TopCoat
That's why I hate PHP: Wordpress needs 20 years to fix all the current issues :D
posts.caption: blog.insight.sensiolabs.com

posts.message:
Microsoft has come a long way in its acceptance of open source. And its motto doesn't seem to be (this time) to embrace and extinguish.

In 2011, Microsoft became one of the top 20 contributors to the Linux kernel … the same Linux that CEO Steve Ballmer described as a “cancer” just over 10 years previously. My, how times change!

this essay contains more details by @maryjofoley

how times change!
posts.caption: zdnet.com
posts.description: Microsoft has come a long way in its acceptance of open source. And its motto doesn't seem to be (this time) to embrace and extinguish.

posts.message:
How do you explain to your clients a bug like this ? This is basically breaking all the input elements on the internet that use the same value for height and line-height ...
Do you use a workaround to fix it? (using padding and decrease the line-height for example?) or you just say we will wait for a fix which is supposed to arrive in a month or less?
I am not seeking technical solution ... I am asking about how to handle the client.
posts.caption: code.google.com

posts.description:
إنتشار الـ Open Source 

فى الفترة الأخيرة لاحظنا إن ناس كتير جدا إبتدت تدخل فى عالم الـ Open Source و إبتدت تتعامل مع Linux بدل الـ Windows. طبعا الـ Open Source ليه مميزات كتير ممكن نبقى نتكلم عليها بعدين لو حابين. بس إحنا محتاجين إنكوا تشاركوا معانا بـ 3 حاجات:-

1- إنت بتستخدم Linux ولا Windows؟
2- ايه هى اهم التوزيعات اللى الناس الجديدة ممكن تستخدمها على Ubuntu 14.4؟ 
3- بقالك أد ايه بتستخدم Linux ؟ لو انت بتستخدمه يعنى :D

كان ممكن نعمل Research على أهم التوزيعات و نكتبهم بس الهدف من الكلام دا إننا عاوزين نجمع توزيعات الناس استخدمتها فعلا يعنى Real Experience عشان ننزلهم فى بوست و يكونوا زى مرجع للناس الجديدة فى الـ Open Source Community :)
